languages.text: "Хорошо. Молись о том, чтобы Он спас твоих солдат, а я буду молиться, чтобы Он послал им достаточно веры и мужества, чтобы праведно погибнуть в решающий час".
"Very well. Pray that He saves your soldiers, and I shall pray that He graces them with enough conviction and courage to die a righteous death when the hour comes."
languages.original_text: "Хорошо. Молись о том, чтобы Он спас твоих солдат, а я буду молиться, чтобы Он послал им достаточно веры и мужества, чтобы праведно погибнуть в решающий час".

traits.locale_text: "Very well. Pray that He saves your soldiers, and I will pray that He graces them with enough conviction and courage to die a righteous death when the hour comes."
"Very well. Pray that He saves your soldiers, and I will pray that He graces them with enough conviction and courage to die a righteous death when the hour comes."
"Very well. Pray that He saves your soldiers, and I shall pray that He graces them with enough conviction and courage to die a righteous death when the hour comes."
"Very well. Pray that He saves your soldiers, and I shall pray that He graces them with enough conviction and courage to die a righteous death when the hour comes."
"Very well. Pray that He saves your soldiers, and I shall pray that He graces them with enough conviction and courage to die a righteous death when the hour comes."

languages.text: "Schön, schön. Betet, dass Er unsere Soldaten rettet, dann bete ich dafür, dass Er ihnen ausreichend Überzeugung und Mut gewährt, um einen rechtschaffenen Tod zu sterben, wenn die Zeit gekommen ist."
languages.original_text: "Very well. Pray that He saves your soldiers, and I shall pray that He graces them with enough conviction and courage to die a righteous death when the hour comes."

traits.locale_text: "Schön, schön. Betet, dass Er unsere Soldaten rettet, dann bete ich dafür, dass Er ihnen ausreichend Überzeugung und Mut gewährt, um einen rechtschaffenen Tod zu sterben, wenn die Zeit gekommen ist.

languages.text: « Très bien. Priez donc pour qu'Il sauve vos soldats, et de mon côté, je prierai pour qu'Il leur accorde la foi et le courage nécessaires pour mourir à Son service le moment venu. »
languages.original_text: "Very well. Pray that He saves your soldiers, and I shall pray that He graces them with enough conviction and courage to die a righteous death when the hour comes."

traits.locale_text: « Très bien. Priez donc pour qu'Il sauve vos soldats, et de mon côté, je prierai pour qu'Il leur accorde la foi et le courage nécessaires pour mourir à Son service le moment venu. »

languages.text: 「よろしい。主が兵士たちを救ってくださるよう祈るのだ。そして私は、主が兵士たちに十分な信念と勇気を与え、時が来たら正しい死を遂げられるよう祈ろう」
languages.original_text: "Very well. Pray that He saves your soldiers, and I shall pray that He graces them with enough conviction and courage to die a righteous death when the hour comes."

traits.locale_text: 「よろしい。主が兵士たちを救ってくださるよう祈るのだ。そして私は、主が兵士たちに十分な信念と勇気を与え、時が来たら正しい死を遂げられるよう祈ろう」

languages.text: «Muy bien. Rece para que salve a sus soldados, y yo rezaré para que les infunda la convicción y el coraje que necesitan para morir con honra cuando llegue el momento».
languages.original_text: "Very well. Pray that He saves your soldiers, and I shall pray that He graces them with enough conviction and courage to die a righteous death when the hour comes."

traits.locale_text: «Muy bien. Rece para que salve a sus soldados, y yo rezaré para que les infunda la convicción y el coraje que necesitan para morir con honra cuando llegue el momento».

languages.text: “很好，愿神皇拯救你的士兵。我也会向神皇祈祷，愿祂赐予士兵坚定的信念与勇气，让他们心怀正义，面对死亡。”
languages.original_text: "Very well. Pray that He saves your soldiers, and I shall pray that He graces them with enough conviction and courage to die a righteous death when the hour comes."

traits.locale_text: “很好，愿神皇拯救你的士兵。我也会向神皇祈祷，愿祂赐予士兵坚定的信念与勇气，让他们心怀正义，面对死亡。”
